about.name: Sneh Patel
about.description: a Fullstack Developer with 3 years of experience building responsive, user-friendly web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Passionate about creating intuitive interfaces that solve real-world problems.

experience.desc: Developed a Node.js wrapper for a C++ library, boosting performance by 300% via multi-threading. Mentored a co-op student in developing a major licensing feature. Designed an AWS S3 chat backup feature, ensuring 99.9% durability with 20% cost savings. Created analytics reports for R&D and presented them to stakeholders.

Automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, cutting deployment time by 50% for 10+ projects. Assisted Ph.D. students with development and deployments, speeding up timelines by 30%. Demonstrated creativity by prototyping layouts to improve user insights.

Developed full-stack web applications using React/Next.js (frontend) and Node.js/Express (backend), improving rendering speed by 30% through memoization and efficient API design. Implemented server-side rendering (SSR) in Next.js for 5+ pages, boosting SEO performance and decreasing page load time by 15%. Automated database backups and migration scripts for MongoDB, saving 10+ hours/month.

Integrated 8+ Node.js endpoints, enhanced data sync by 30% with runtime adjustments. Built SPAs using React and Babel, optimized performance for scalability needs. Iterated designs rapidly to enhance user experience.

projects.description: Developed a hotel management system with multi-cloud architecture using AWS and GCP.
Managed GKE containers with Terraform and CI/CD pipelines, speeding up deployments by 40%.
Developed an AI-driven resume builder with Node.js, React, and AWS, supporting 200+ users.
Built a MERN stack travel booking platform with role-based access and Google SSO.
Built a RAG-based app with Python and Ollama API, improved response accuracy by 35%.
Built quantum-inspired RNG for Node.js with 0.995 bits/entropy via C++ bindings. Published as an NPM package.
Developed a quantum-resistant chat app with Electron.js, liboqs, and Vernam cipher. Achieved 300% faster encryption.
Created Node.js bindings for NIST-standard liboqs, enabling quantum-safe cryptography in JavaScript.
Built a GPS-based parking app with Jetpack Compose, Google Maps SDK, and Firebase.
Built a RAG-based app with Python and Ollama API, improved response accuracy by 35%.
Built a PERN stack travel booking platform with admin panel and CI/CD on Google Cloud Run.
Designed a greedy Simplify Debt algorithm for group debt management with 75%+ test coverage.
Created a serverless anime streaming platform with AWS, supporting 5,000+ daily users.
Built a banking system with Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL, supporting 100+ users.
